root: ^I must admit I was surprised that you wished to meet with me.
^I am surprised, too. Ariar was never able to convince you to join us, I thought you would be unwilling to even meet with us.
^We are suffering from some tension within our own house.
^Which is rare, might I add. I believe some of our citizens have grown impatient without their magic.
^Understandably, I was knocked out pretty back because of it.
^Quite. But please, do not let me interrupt.

^Do not worry. We value what you have to say. But our issue is that some of our subjects believe that the ongoing magic crisis may be to the benefit of the world, as it has mandated the houses work in unison.
^This hardly seems like an issue. Do you not value freedom of thought?
^We absolutely value that freedom, and admire our subjects' bravery. However, the issue is that those who disagree are beginning to have serious conflict with those others.
^We have promised to make a statement to our subjects this night, but alas, we do not know which side to condemn.
^Could you not just condemn the violence?
^We always condemn violence. Though in this instance our subjects are so passionate that they will merely listen to a condemnation of violence.
^So we ask you, a worthy outsider, should we condemn those considering the magic crisis to be good, or those who consider it to be bad?

CONDEMNTHESUPPORTERS: ^If left to me, I would condemn those who support the loss of magic.
^The loss of magic is only going to tear the houses apart.
^To my mind, we must focus on correcting the issue of magic rather than use it for a statement on unity. Magic helps people defend themselves. Unity can come simply by having our affairs in order.
^Very well, we will consider what you have to say. Thank you for your time.
CONDEMNTHEDENIERS: ^Perhaps your subjects are correct. This could unify the houses. Most issues of conflict only affect one house. This affects all equally, and as such, the houses must work equally.
^You are a wise detective. We will not only support this belief, but we hope to take advantage of this opportunity.
